decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using a variety of removal spells, counterspells, and card advantage engines. The deck aims to stall the game until it can establish a dominant board presence with powerful threats like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines. The combination of efficient removal, powerful creatures, and card advantage engines helps the deck maintain control over the game and ultimately outvalue the opponent. The deck also has some utility lands and sideboard options to adapt to different matchups.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive plays with a mix of disruption and removal. Utilizing cards like Dauthi Voidwalker to disrupt the opponent's plans and Thoughtseize to control their hand, this deck aims to quickly apply pressure with creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger. Additionally, cards like Not Dead After All and Orcish Bowmasters provide additional disruption and removal options. The deck also includes some powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to close out games swiftly.

The deck focuses on utilizing a multicolored Aggro strategy, with a strong emphasis on efficient creature removal, powerful creatures, and mana ramping. The key concept revolves around creating a fast-paced and aggressive gameplay style that puts pressure on the opponent early on. By strategically utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Tribal Flames, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory before they have a chance to recover. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an extra layer of flexibility and power to the deck.

The deck focuses on utilizing creatures with various abilities to create a toolbox approach, allowing for flexibility in different situations. By using cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Chord of Calling, the deck can assemble powerful combinations and control the board. The inclusion of creatures like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse provide additional threats and value. The deck also includes cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Blood Artist for life gain and draining effects. Overall, the deck aims to efficiently utilize creatures and combos to outvalue and outmaneuver opponents.

This deck focuses on quickly getting creatures into the graveyard and then using Living End to bring them back onto the battlefield in a powerful combo. By cycling cards like Street Wraith and Architects of Will, as well as using cards like Grief to disrupt the opponent's hand, the deck is able to set up for a game-ending Living End. The creatures in the deck, such as Waker of Waves and Curator of Mysteries, provide additional value when brought back with Living End, allowing for a powerful and efficient win condition.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays and disruption, utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Grief to pressure opponents and disrupt their game plan. The deck also includes powerful threats like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger to close out games quickly. The deck features a mix of creature removal, hand disruption and land destruction to control the board and maintain pressure on the opponent. With a combination of speed and disruption, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

This deck revolves around assembling the Amulet Titan combo to quickly ramp up mana and cheat out powerful threats like Primeval Titan. The key strategy involves utilizing cards like Amulet of Vigor and Simic Growth Chamber to generate additional mana and take advantage of land synergies. By efficiently tutoring for key pieces and utilizing bounce lands effectively, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm opponents with massive threats and landfall triggers, ultimately securing victory through a combination of explosive plays and overwhelming board presence.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying artifact creatures and utilizing artifacts to boost their power and protect them. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing cards like Springleaf Drum and Simulacrum Synthesizer to quickly ramp up mana and deploy threats. The deck also has disruption elements like Pithing Needle and Metallic Rebuke to control the opponent's game plan. Urza's Saga is a key card in this deck, allowing for additional artifact tokens to be created and further increasing the deck's board presence.

This deck aims to establish a strong lock on the game by combining Nine Lives and Solemnity to prevent any damage from being dealt to the player. The control elements of the deck, such as Spell Pierce and Sterling Grove, help protect the combo pieces while also disrupting the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of Phyrexian Unlife provides an alternative win condition by allowing the player to survive even if their life total would be reduced to zero. The deck also utilizes card selection and filtering to find the necessary pieces quickly and efficiently.

This deck focuses on leveraging the power of multicolored cards to assemble a fast and aggressive board presence. By utilizing cards like Leyline of the Guildpact and Tribal Flames, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu further enhance the deck's aggressive strategy, while cards like Stubborn Denial provide protection and disruption. With a mix of efficient creatures and powerful spells, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and secure a swift victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive play with Rakdos-colored creatures and spells. It aims to disrupt the opponent's hand with cards like Grief and Thoughtseize while utilizing fast creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to apply pressure. The deck also includes removal spells like Terminate and Fatal Push to deal with opposing threats. Additionally, there are disruptive elements like Angrath's Rampage and Blood Moon to further disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of powerful cards like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse adds additional threats and resilience to the deck.
